GenAiFunction.description:
Retrieve metadata about objects, fields, relationships and picklist values in the org.
IMPORTANT - When exploring specific objects (objectDetails scope), ALWAYS call this function first with 'allObjects' scope to validate object existence before requesting object details. This prevents errors from attempting to explore non-existent objects. - This tool MUST be used before executing SOQL queries to Non Standard Custom objects to: -- Validate object existence and accessibility -- Verify field names and data types -- Check relationship structures -- Explore picklist values for picklist/multi-picklist fields -- Ensure proper query construction - This tool is NOT needed for well-known standard objects like Account, Contact, Opportunity, etc.
Operation Modes: - allObjects: Lists custom objects only, sorted alphabetically - objectDetails: Returns field details for specified objects including: * Field API Name * Data Type * Reference Objects (for lookup/master-detail) * Relationship Name * Active Picklist Values (for picklist/multi-picklist fields)
Best Practices: - Use allObjects for broad data model exploration - Use objectDetails for specific query planning - Always verify relationship fields before joins - Check field types for proper query filters - Check picklist values before filtering on picklist fields - Validate object access before querying - Consider field-level security - Maximum 10 objects per request recommended - Case-insensitive object name matching - Returns empty response for inaccessible objects
